reg_info.act_under: Industrial Standards Act   Loi sur les normes industrielles

content.content: 1. An advisory committee established for a schedule may suspend assessments under the schedule if the advisory committee and the Director are satisfied that the amounts already assessed are sufficient for the expenditures that the advisory committee is authorized to make from such assessments. O. Reg. 84/01, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. An advisory committee established for a schedule may suspend assessments under the schedule if the advisory committee and the Director are satisfied that the amounts already assessed are sufficient for the expenditures that the advisory committee is authorized to make from such assessments. O. Reg. 84/01, s. 1.
